about_the_game:
ODouzy!!! is an exciting and dynamic action game set in a cute, minimalist world made entirely of geometric shapes. In this unique game, players control a rectangular character as they navigate through vibrant levels filled with aliens, bombs, and beans. The goal is to collect beans, avoid bomb-tracking missiles, and swallow aliens to score points.

Unlike traditional games in the same genre, ODouzy!!! introduces more randomness, with unexpected challenges that keep every moment fresh and unpredictable. The game features a unique alien update system powered by Douzy, providing players with a sense of accomplishment similar to the feeling of cleaning as they complete tasks.

With simple yet challenging mechanics, a colorful geometric world, and dynamic alien updates, ODouzy!!! offers a fun and rewarding experience, perfect for players who enjoy casual, light-hearted gameplay.

name: ODouzy!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better

short_description: In ODouzy!!!, guide a cute rectangle through colorful levels, dodging bomb traps and collecting beans and douzy. With a blend of simple movement mechanics and challenging puzzles, navigate vibrant worlds and gather enough the douzy to emerge victorious in this lighthearted, strategic adventure!
